<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero]]> <[[http://www.youtube.com/honeywell]]> <[[https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475]]> <[[http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]>
In 60-seconds <[[https://corpapp.honeywell.com/sites/honvideo/Pages/Player.aspx?bctid=4862127981001&UsrId=e045068&ItmId=5951]]> we’ll talk about how the “LITTLE things” can make a BIG difference for customers.
“Little things” can make the difference between success and failure for a company. Here’s why: Most people react emotionally because of the attention paid to minor details. Most people think it’s the big things that make a big difference for customers. But in reality, it’s the result of a lot of little things being done along the way. It’s easy to overlook the little details. That’s probably why so few people do them.
Little things can have a huge impact on our customers’ experience.
So watch the second CX Minute writing video <[[https://corpapp.honeywell.com/sites/honvideo/Pages/Player.aspx?bctid=4862127981001&UsrId=e045068&ItmId=5951]]> now! Then, let us know what you think.
